settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.text: Find answers to the most common questions about shopping with us.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping is available for 2-3 business days delivery.

settings.question: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $100.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn and in original packaging.

settings.question: How do I start a return?
settings.answer: Visit your account page or contact our customer service team to initiate a return.

settings.question: When will I receive my refund?
settings.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return.

settings.question: How do I find my size?
settings.answer: Check our size guide on each product page for detailed measurements and fit recommendations.

settings.question: Are your products authentic?
settings.answer: Yes, all our products are 100% authentic and sourced directly from brands or authorized distributors.

settings.title: Still Have Questions?
settings.text: Still have questions? Contact our customer service team and we'll be happy to help.
